Test.TestName: BASIC NOTIFICATION INTERFACE – CONJUNCTION IN NOTIFY FILTER (TOPIC SUB-TREE AND OR OPERATION)

Test.TestName: BASIC NOTIFICATION INTERFACE – TOPIC SUB-TREE IN PULLMESSAGES FILTER
Test.Name: topicSet contain at least one topic with IsPropery= ”true”
Test.Description: check that not appear widow for operator Use "tns1:Device/Trigger/Relay" on Management tab
